All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentViewController
Controller for adding appointments
AddCustomerViewController
Controller for adding customers
Appointment
Appointment object for use throughout the application
appUtils
Class that contains common methods used throughout the application
Contact
Object to store contact information
ContactsReportsViewController
Controller for viewing the contacts reports
Country
Object ot hold country data
Customer
Object for storing the customer information to be used throughout the application
CustomerReport
Class to hold customer report information from the database
CustomerReportsViewController
Controller for viewing the customer reports
DBConnect
Class that holds the connection data and creates the connection for all read and write
DBQuery
Class the holds all of the database queries for the application
DBWrite
Class that contains all database write functions
Division
Class to hold division information
Logging
Class that allows for reading and writing of logs
LoginViewController
Controller for the login form that allows users to login to the application
LogViewController
Controller to view the logs generated by the login form
MainApplication
This application allows users to create scheduling and view reports for customers as a part of the consulting that is offered by their firm Users can add, modify, and delete customers as well as appointments
MainController
Controller for the main screen of the application.
ModAppointmentViewController
Controller for modifying appointments
ModCustomerViewController
Controller to modify the selected customer
ReadmeViewController
Controller to view the readme file as an about
ShowAppointmentsViewController
Controller to display all weekly and monthly appointments
ShowCustomersViewController
Controller to show all customers
User
Class to store user object information
UsersReportsViewController
Controller to view the user reports
Vars
Class to hold static objects for use in multiple classes
